scripts.install-flutter: if [ ! -d 'flutter' ]; then curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.16.0-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ; fi
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-flutter && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter --version && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html
